gobblin.runtime.cli

Class CliOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.runtime.cli.CliOptions

  • public class CliOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for parsing command line options for Gobblin cli jobs.

      • parseArgs

        public static java.util.Properties parseArgs(java.lang.Class<?> caller,
                                             java.lang.String[] args)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Parse command line arguments and return a Properties object for the gobblin job found.
        Parameters:
        caller - Class of the calling main method. Used for error logs.
        args - Command line arguments.
        Returns:
        Instance of Properties for the Gobblin job to run.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • printUsage

        public static void printUsage(java.lang.Class<?> caller)
        Prints the usage of cli.
        Parameters:
        caller - Class of the main method called. Used in printing the usage message.
